titleStmt.title: The mothers counsell or, liue within compasse Being the last will and testament to her dearest daughter.
titleStmt.author: M. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop in spur street without Newgate, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: "Good counsell to the Christian reader" signed: M. R.

Imperfect; title page mutilated, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
